author: jstrachan
msg: made it a little easier to use references to refer to Endpoints from within the XML configuration; so <from ref="someEndpoint"> or <to ref="someEndpoint"/> also avoided the need for <routes> within a <camelContext/> to simplify the XML

author: chathura_ce
msg: Did minor changes to the Address and WSDL factories to reflect some configuration enhancements.
Improved the Synapse configuration language documentation with comprehensive descriptions about endpoints.
